div.p: This page provides a list of the FHIR artifacts defined as part of this implementation guide.
General constraints on FHIR resources to be adhered to as part of the eLTSS implementation guide that apply regardless of what area(s) of Long Term Care are of interest

tr.td: Base profile that defines characteristics shared by all CarePlan resources in eLTSS.
Defines the overall Claim constraints for eLTSS.
Defines the overall Contract constraints for eLTSS.
Defines the overall Patient constraints for eLTSS.

div.p: Extensions defined as part of the eLTSS implementation guide
Example(s) showing the use of the eLTSS profiles
